name: Hope Consultants International Ltd.
body:
### Welcome to our GitHub Page
This is where we publish some of our projects.  
Feel free to fork or contribute.

### Projects
 * [IC Discuss](https://github.com/Hope-Consultants-International/IC-Discuss)
 * [Tiny URLs for Liferay](http://hope-consultants-international.github.io/tinyurl-portlet)

### Support or Contact
We generally offer no support for our published projects.  
If you want to contact us, please visit our [contacts page](http://www.hopeconsultants.org/HCI/Contact_us.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
